suggest.amasty/social-login-graphql: Install amasty/social-login-graphql module to activate Graphql and Social Login integration.
suggest.amasty/module-social-login-recaptcha: Install amasty/module-social-login-recaptcha module to activate Google ReCaptcha and Social Login integration.
suggest.amasty/module-social-to-builder: Install Amasty_SocialToBuilder module to activate the integration with Custom Reports Builder extension and create valuable reports about your Social Networks.
